Articles.Content:
Bill's plan to conquer other worlds:

![vPhJNtL.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/vPhJNtL.jpg)

(yes, I know, I have too much time on my hands)
What's that? A Trojan rabbit rover?
Kerbunnyrover. Icon of Playkerbal. That should be pretty obscure enough, but I'm whiting it out just in case.
I hear the sound of galloping koconuts.
Oh.... Um, l-look, if we built this large wooden badger--
If nobody gets the reference, watch Monty Python and the Holy Grail. You *will* thank me later.
I got it! Watching that movie was worth it just for getting Internet references to it. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Now, you must cut down the highest tree on Kerbin ... with a herring!

> 
> I got it! Watching that movie was worth it just for getting Internet references to it. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

God, this makes me feel so old. I remember making references to this movie WAY before the internet, lol.

> 
> Now, you must cut down the highest tree on Kerbin ... with a herring!

*Ni, Ni* **NI!** x ad infinitum
lol love the ears, very funny

As long as we're combining Kerbal Space Program and Monty Python (and the holy grail)

![xdOUbns.png](http://i.imgur.com/xdOUbns.png)

*(and yes I made that)*

I was recently accused of sorcery due to some kerbal construction. The question was: do you weigh more than a duck. My response: I ... I don't know ... I lost a few pounds recently. I do weigh more than an African Swallow. I had a big problem with my coconuts.
You should put a steering wheel down the front of your pants. I tried that and within a few minutes it was drivin' me nuts.

i think this would be extremely lethal (perhaps 1 shot a capital ship) when strapped to a SRB and aimed remotely at the target........

Anyways, lol.
I was expecting a booster. I'm disappointed now ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> I was expecting a booster. I'm disappointed now ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

That's what the sparrow needed. A booster.
